definition: Qeshqer wilayiti, Kashgar or Kāshí prefecture in west Xinjiang near Kyrgyzstan
ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc)/assorted/miscellaneous
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Recorded in W Xinjiang in Kunlun Mts and Kashi region.
sentences.chinese: 國內分佈新疆西部的昆倫山脈及喀什地區。

sentences.english: In Kashgar region paper media, The Kashgar Daily is the authoritative media.
sentences.chinese: 喀什地區紙質媒體中以《喀什日報》爲權威媒體。
